trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display when a user has not performed required designer actions at design time.
trans-unit.target: 提供的圖像<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>使用者沒有在設計階段執行所需的設計工具動作時顯示。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Activity designers use ConfigErrorGlyph to display actions associated with smart tags on the designer surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]活動設計工具可用於 ConfigErrorGlyph 顯示設計工具介面上智慧標籤相關聯的動作。

trans-unit.source: For example, if an activity requires users to set a property, the activity designer displays ConfigErrorGlyph to help notify them that they are required to set the property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果活動需要使用者設定屬性，活動設計工具會顯示 ConfigErrorGlyph 以幫助通知他們所需設定屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph"></xref> can gain focus on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which it is associated.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph"></xref>上可以取得焦點<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>與它相關聯。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer glyph can be activated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以啟動設計工具圖像。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的圖像界限<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the glyph is associated.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>與圖像相關聯。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示圖像是否顯示在活動設計工具介面上否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，代表圖像的界限。

trans-unit.source: designer contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: designer包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the glyph that an action has been performed which has activated the glyph.
trans-unit.target: 通知圖像的動作已經執行啟動圖像。

trans-unit.source: When OnActivate is called, the designer verbs associated with the glyph are displayed on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: OnActivate 呼叫時，與圖像相關聯的設計工具動詞會顯示在活動設計工具介面上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the glyph is drawn.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>上繪製圖像。

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 執行任何轉譯活動設計工具介面上的圖像時所需的工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>可執行填滿與繪製工作。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示圖像顯示在設計介面。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> to use to access ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"> </xref>来用來存取環境屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>要從其中取得使用者動作的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得活動設計工具介面上的圖像的優先權設定。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph"></xref> on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，表示的優先順序設定<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConfigErrorGlyph"></xref>活動設計介面上。
